title: Historical Performance of Newmont Corporation Stock Compared to Industry Benchmarks

content.text: Newmont Corporation is a leading gold and copper producer with operations and assets spread across the globe. To evaluate its historical performance, we compare the stock's performance to industry benchmarks, which represent the broader market sentiment and performance in the mining sector.

Newmont Corporation has shown significant growth over the years, with a strong upward trajectory. From January 1, 2010, to December 31, 2021, the stock price has increased by X%. This long-term growth is reflective of the company's successful mining operations, strategic acquisitions, and favorable commodity prices.

To provide context for Newmont's performance, it is crucial to compare the stock to industry benchmarks. The most commonly used benchmark for the mining sector is the S&P Global Natural Resources Index, which includes companies engaged in various natural resources industries, including mining. This index provides a comprehensive measure of the overall performance of the sector.

When comparing Newmont Corporation's stock performance to the S&P Global Natural Resources Index, results may indicate if the company has outperformed or underperformed the broader industry. Additionally, analyzing the stock's relative performance against other major mining companies within the benchmark can provide insights on Newmont's competitive position.

By analyzing the historical performance of Newmont Corporation stock compared to industry benchmarks, we can gain a better understanding of the company's growth and performance relative to its peers. This objective analysis provides valuable context for investors and stakeholders interested in assessing the company's long-term prospects.

news.headline: UPDATE 3-Newmont beats quarterly profit, production estimates on Newcrest assets boost
news.summary: Newmont Corp beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, as the world's largest gold miner benefited from strong production and higher sales.  Quarterly attributable gold production in the quarter rose to 1.7 million ounces from 1.3 million ounces a year earlier, boosted through sites acquired following its acquisition of Australia's Newcrest A$26.2 billion ($17.06 billion) in November.  On an adjusted basis, the Denver, Colorado-based Newmont posted a net income of 55 cents per share for the quarter ended March 31, compared with the average analyst estimate of 36 cents per share, according to LSEG data.

news.headline: Newmont beats quarterly profit, production estimates on Newcrest assets boost
news.summary: (Reuters) -Newmont Corp beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, as the world's largest gold miner benefited from strong production and higher sales.  Quarterly attributable gold production in the quarter rose to 1.7 million ounces from 1.3 million ounces a year earlier, boosted through sites acquired following its acquisition of Australia's Newcrest A$26.2 billion ($17.06 billion) in November.  On an adjusted basis, the Denver, Colorado-based Newmont posted a net income of 55 cents per share for the quarter ended March 31, compared with the average analyst estimate of 36 cents per share, according to LSEG data.

news.headline: Newmont Appoints Mining Industry Veteran Francois Hardy as Chief Technology Officer
news.summary: DENVER, April 19, 2024--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) today announced the appointment of Francois Hardy as Chief Technology Officer (CTO). Francois will join Newmont’s Executive Leadership Team and lead the technical work across the business to improve operational performance and drive growth.

news.headline: Newmont Publishes 2023 Sustainability Report and 2023 Tax & Royalties Report
news.summary: DENVER, April 18, 2024--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) today published its 2023 Sustainability Report and its 2023 Taxes and Royalties Contributions Report. The reports highlight the company’s material ESG and socio-economic contributions over the past year. This year marks the 20th anniversary for Newmont’s Annual Sustainability Report, representing a milestone for the company as a longstanding industry leader in sustainability.
